channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Snoop Dogg Finally Scores His First Steal on ‘The Voice’
item.description: 🎤 Snoop Dogg is bringing his signature style to #TheVoice! 🌟 Can't wait to see him in action! 🎶 #MusicNews

item.title: Zac Brown, Joe Walsh Will Join ‘The Voice’ Season 28 as Mega Mentors
item.description: 🎤🌟 Exciting news! @zacbrownband and @JoeWalshOfficial are bringing their talent to @NBCTheVoice as mega mentors for Season 28! 🙌 #TheVoice #MusicNews

item.title: Echo & the Bunnymen Announce 2026 North American Greatest Hits Tour
item.description: 🎸 Jumping for joy! @OfficialEATB are hitting the road with all their hits in 2026! Who's joining us? 🐰🎶 #EchoAndTheBunnymenTour2026

item.title: Gracie Abrams’ Magical Red Rocks Shows Will Be Livestreamed on Apple Music
item.description: ✨ Experience the magic of @gracieabrams at Red Rocks, no matter where you are! 🎶🌄 Livestream on Apple Music coming soon! 🎉 #GracieAbrams #RedRocksMagic

item.title: John Mulaney Adds New 2026 Dates to “Mister Whatever” Tour
item.description: 🌟 Ready to laugh ‘til you cry? John Mulaney just dropped new tour dates for 2026! Who’s snagging tickets? 🎤🎉 #ComedyGold
